languages.text: "Emelina is a Sage. A unique acolyte of the Inquisition who can absorb huge amounts of knowledge and store it in her own memory more securely than any data-crypt. She entered the Lord Inquisitor's retinue before even I did. Talking to her is... a strange experience, but that is barely scratching the surface of who she is. Emelina is an incredible scholar, an expert on the forbidden and the illicit. And, of course, she is a loyal servant of the Golden Throne."
languages.original_text: "Эмелина — савант. Уникальный аколит, способный поглощать огромные объемы знаний и хранить их в собственной памяти — надежнее любой инфокрипты. Она появилась среди спутников Лорд-инквизитора еще до меня. Общение с ней... специфично, однако это лишь верхний слой. Эмелина — блестящая книжница, специалист по запретному и недозволенному. И, конечно же, преданная служительница Золотого Трона".

She entered the Lord Inquisitor's retinue before even I did. Talking to her is... a strange experience, but that is barely scratching the surface of who she is. Emelina is an incredible scholar, an expert on the forbidden and the illicit. And, of course, she is a loyal servant of the Golden Throne."

Emelina is an incredible scholar, an expert on the forbidden and the illicit. And, of course, she is a loyal servant of the Golden Throne."

languages.text: "Эмелина — савант. Уникальный аколит, способный поглощать огромные объемы знаний и хранить их в собственной памяти — надежнее любой инфокрипты. Она появилась среди спутников Лорд-инквизитора еще до меня. Общение с ней... специфично, однако это лишь верхний слой. Эмелина — блестящая книжница, специалист по запретному и недозволенному. И, конечно же, преданная служительница Золотого Трона".
“艾米莉娜是位贤者，也是审判庭独一无二的侍仆。她可以吸收大量知识，将其储存在她自己的记忆中，这种存储方式比一切数据密存器都要更加安全。她在我之前加入了审判庭，为大审判官效力。与她交谈……是一种奇特的体验。不过，这些都是非常皮毛的事情。艾米莉娜是位了不起的学者，是违禁与禁忌知识方面的专家。当然，她也是黄金王座的忠诚仆人。”
languages.original_text: "Emelina is a Sage. A unique acolyte of the Inquisition who can absorb huge amounts of knowledge and store it in her own memory more securely than any data-crypt. She entered the Lord Inquisitor's retinue before even I did. Talking to her is... a strange experience, but that is barely scratching the surface of who she is. Emelina is an incredible scholar, an expert on the forbidden and the illicit. And, of course, she is a loyal servant of the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: “艾米莉娜是位贤者，也是审判庭独一无二的侍仆。她可以吸收大量知识，将其储存在她自己的记忆中，这种存储方式比一切数据密存器都要更加安全。她在我之前加入了审判庭，为审判长效力。与她交谈……是一种奇特的体验。不过，这些都是非常皮毛的事情。艾米莉娜是位了不起的学者，是违禁与禁忌知识方面的专家。当然，她也是黄金王座的忠诚仆人。”

languages.text: «Emelina es una sabia; una acólita única de la Inquisición capaz de absorber vastas cantidades de saber y almacenarlo en su propia memoria con más seguridad que ninguna cripta de datos. Entró en el séquito del Lord Inquisidor incluso antes que yo. Hablar con ella es... una experiencia peculiar, aunque eso solo es lo más superficial. Emelina es una erudita increíble, experta en lo prohibido y lo ilícito. Y, por supuesto, sirve con lealtad al Trono Dorado».
languages.original_text: "Emelina is a Sage. A unique acolyte of the Inquisition who can absorb huge amounts of knowledge and store it in her own memory more securely than any data-crypt. She entered the Lord Inquisitor's retinue before even I did. Talking to her is... a strange experience, but that is barely scratching the surface of who she is. Emelina is an incredible scholar, an expert on the forbidden and the illicit. And, of course, she is a loyal servant of the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: «Emelina es una sabia; una acólita única de la Inquisición capaz de absorber vastas cantidades de saber y almacenarlo en su propia memoria con más seguridad que ninguna cripta de datos. Entró en el séquito del Lord Inquisidor incluso antes que yo. Hablar con ella es... una experiencia peculiar, aunque eso solo es lo más superficial. Emelina es una erudita increíble, experta en lo prohibido y lo ilícito. Y, por supuesto, sirve con lealtad al Trono Dorado».

languages.text: 「エメリナさんは賢者です。異端審問庁の独特なアコライトであり、膨大な量の知識を吸収し、それをどのデータ・クリプトよりも安全に自分の記憶に保存することができます。彼女は我よりも先にロード・インクィジターに入った。彼女と話すのは…奇妙な経験ですが、それは彼女の人格のほんの一部をなぞっただけです。エメリナさんは素晴らしい学者であり、禁断と違法の専門家です。そしてもちろん、彼女は黄金の玉座の忠実な僕です」
languages.original_text: "Emelina is a Sage. A unique acolyte of the Inquisition who can absorb huge amounts of knowledge and store it in her own memory more securely than any data-crypt. She entered the Lord Inquisitor's retinue before even I did. Talking to her is... a strange experience, but that is barely scratching the surface of who she is. Emelina is an incredible scholar, an expert on the forbidden and the illicit. And, of course, she is a loyal servant of the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: 「エメリナさんは賢者です。異端審問庁の独特なアコライトであり、膨大な量の知識を吸収し、それをどのデータ・クリプトよりも安全に自分の記憶に保存することができます。彼女は我よりも先にロード・インクィジターに入った。彼女と話すのは…奇妙な経験ですが、それは彼女の人格のほんの一部をなぞっただけです。エメリナさんは素晴らしい学者であり、禁断と違法の専門家です。そしてもちろん、彼女は黄金の玉座の忠実な僕です」

languages.text: « Emelina est une sage : une acolyte unique de l'Inquisition capable d'absorber énormément de connaissances et de les stocker dans sa propre mémoire, avec une fiabilité supérieure à n'importe quelle crypte de données. Elle a rejoint l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur avant moi. Lui parler est... une expérience étrange, c'est le moins que l'on puisse dire. Emelina est une remarquable érudite, une experte sur tout ce qui touche à l'interdit et à l'illicite. Et, bien évidemment, c'est une loyale servante du Trône d'Or. »
languages.original_text: "Emelina is a Sage. A unique acolyte of the Inquisition who can absorb huge amounts of knowledge and store it in her own memory more securely than any data-crypt. She entered the Lord Inquisitor's retinue before even I did. Talking to her is... a strange experience, but that is barely scratching the surface of who she is. Emelina is an incredible scholar, an expert on the forbidden and the illicit. And, of course, she is a loyal servant of the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: « Emelina est une sage : une acolyte unique de l'Inquisition capable d'absorber énormément de connaissances et de les stocker dans sa propre mémoire, avec une fiabilité supérieure à n'importe quelle crypte de données. Elle a rejoint l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur avant moi. Lui parler est... une expérience étrange, c'est le moins que l'on puisse dire. Emelina est une remarquable érudite, une experte sur tout ce qui touche à l'interdit et à l'illicite. Et, bien évidemment, c'est une loyale servante du Trône d'Or. »

languages.text: "Emelina ist eine Weise. Eine einzigartige Akolythin der Inquisition, die enorme Mengen von Wissen aufnehmen und in ihrem eigenen Gedächtnis sicherer speichern kann als jede Daten-Krypta. Sie gehörte schon vor mir zum Gefolge des Großinquisitors. Ein Gespräch mit ihr ist ... eine seltsame Erfahrung, aber das kratzt nur an der Oberfläche dessen, wer sie ist. Emelina ist eine unglaubliche Gelehrte, eine Expertin in allem, was verboten und untersagt ist. Und natürlich ist sie eine treue Dienerin des Goldenen Throns."
languages.original_text: "Emelina is a Sage. A unique acolyte of the Inquisition who can absorb huge amounts of knowledge and store it in her own memory more securely than any data-crypt. She entered the Lord Inquisitor's retinue before even I did. Talking to her is... a strange experience, but that is barely scratching the surface of who she is. Emelina is an incredible scholar, an expert on the forbidden and the illicit. And, of course, she is a loyal servant of the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: "Emelina ist eine Weise. Eine einzigartige Akolythin der Inquisition, die enorme Mengen von Wissen aufnehmen und in ihrem eigenen Gedächtnis sicherer speichern kann als jede Daten-Krypta. Sie gehörte schon vor mir zum Gefolge des Großinquisitors. Ein Gespräch mit ihr ist ... eine seltsame Erfahrung, aber das kratzt nur an der Oberfläche dessen, wer sie ist. Emelina ist eine unglaubliche Gelehrte, eine Expertin in allem, was verboten und untersagt ist. Und natürlich ist sie eine treue Dienerin des Goldenen Throns."

languages.text: "Emelina bir Âlim'dir. Devasa miktarda bilgiyi özümseyip kendi hafızasında veri mahzenlerine kıyasla çok daha güvenli bir şekilde saklayabilen, özel bir Engizisyon havarisidir. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun maiyetine benden bile önce katılmış. Onunla konuşmak... Tuhaf bir deneyimdir. Bu da çok yüzeysel bir tanımlama oldu tabii. Emelina inanılmaz bir bilim insanıdır, yasaklı ve etik dışı şeyler üzerine uzmandır. Ayrıca Altın Taht'ın da sadık bir hizmetkârıdır."
languages.original_text: "Emelina is a Sage. A unique acolyte of the Inquisition who can absorb huge amounts of knowledge and store it in her own memory more securely than any data-crypt. She entered the Lord Inquisitor's retinue before even I did. Talking to her is... a strange experience, but that is barely scratching the surface of who she is. Emelina is an incredible scholar, an expert on the forbidden and the illicit. And, of course, she is a loyal servant of the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: "Emelina bir Âlim'dir. Devasa miktarlarda bilgiyi özümseyip, veri mahzenlerinden çok daha güvenli şekilde kendi hafızasında saklayabilen, özel bir Engizisyon havarisidir. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun maiyetine benden bile önce dâhil olmuş. Onunla konuşmak... Tuhaf bir deneyimdir ancak bu da yüzeysel bir tanımlama oldu, kim olduğunu tarif edebilmek için uzun saatler gerekir. Emelina inanılmaz bir bilim insanıdır ve yasaklı ve etik dışı şeyler üzerine uzmandır. Tabii ki Altın Taht'ın da sadık bir hizmetkârıdır."
